Module com.cbodo.schedule
Package com.cbodo.schedule.controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cbodo.schedule.controller.UpdateCustomerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class UpdateCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class handles the logic for the edit customer form.

      Sets the address example label to match the current country.
      void setDivisionType()
      Initializes the division type base on user's current location and displays it in the UI.
      void updateDivisions()
      Updates divisionComboBox to include only divisions in the selected country.

    • Method Detail

      • updateDivisions

        public void updateDivisions()
        Updates divisionComboBox to include only divisions in the selected country. Sets the address example label to match the current country.

      • formIsFilled

        public boolean formIsFilled()
        Checks all fields for input.
        Returns:
        True if all fields have input, false if any field is empty.

                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new customer object.
        Returns:
        The new customer object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for retrieving new customer ID and division ID from database.

        Sets the address example label to match the current country.

      • addListenersToFields

        public void addListenersToFields()
        Adds event listeners to the focused property of all fields to remove errors when the field is selected. LAMBDA: Statement lambdas used to call the clearError() method when field is focused.
